ref: 7531 nistāra m. ʻ deliverance ʼ Bhartr̥., ʻ discharge of debt ʼ Hit. [See nistarati. -- &rcirclemacr Pa. nitthāra -- m. ʻ rescue, payment, acquittance ʼ; Pk. ṇitthāra -- m. ʻ saving ʼ; P. nitār m. ʻ clear liquid remaining after all sediment is deposited ʼ; Ku. nitār, nithār ʻ drainage, watershed ʼ; N. nithār ʻ residue, sediment ʼ; Si. natara ʻ support, sustenance, livelihood ʼ.
